clauses.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text: The Postal Service reserves the right to remove or edit any messages or material submitted by users.

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for purposes including advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: Ad banner cookies are set when you view or click on an ad banner on usps.com, or an ad banner on another site for a USPS product, and persist for no more than five years.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text: "We do not disclose your information to third parties without your consent, except to facilitate the transaction, to act on your behalf or request, or as legally required. This includes the following limited circumstances: [...] to entities, including law enforcement, as required by law or in legal proceedings."

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions
clauses.description: Additional personal data may be collected through contests, surveys, promotions, petitions or sweepstakes.
clauses.clause_text: From time to time as part of a special Postal Service promotion, such as stamp collecting, we may request information from children under 13 years of age.

case.text: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text:
It may also include specific data, such as whether you are a repeat visitor.
whether you visited a page with a banner on it or clicked on an ad banner and then used our site (for instance, to register or make a purchase).
the value, date and time of any sale.
and the identity of the site which you linked to or from usps.com.

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text: We occasionally collect data about you from financial entities to perform verification services and from commercial sources.

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.
clauses.clause_text: The government may scan electronic communications with USPS

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: On behalf of the USPS, persistent cookies and beacons (described below) may be set and managed by third party advertising suppliers to support ad banners.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the serviceâ€™s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text:
We do not disclose your information to third parties without your consent, except to facilitate the transaction, to act on your behalf or request, or as legally required.
This includes the following limited circumstances: to a congressional office on your behalf.
to financial entities regarding financial transaction issues.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: The Postal Service uses a third-party analytics provider (currently Google Analytics Premium) to analyze data from cookies.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
clauses.clause_text: In no event shall the Postal Service's liability to a user for any loss, damage or claim exceed the amount paid by the user for accessing this site.

case.text: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

clauses.title: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Blocking tracking technologies will not negatively impact your use of the service.
clauses.clause_text:
Opting Out of Web Analysis Tools

If you still have concerns about cookies, you may choose to opt out of their use.

Ad banner cookies â€“ You can opt out of ad banner cookies, without erasing or altering other cookies. If you opt out of these cookies, we will no longer track any information from ad banners related to a specific user's visit. By clicking below, you will be taken to a third party site that explains how to opt out.

Click here to learn how to opt out of ad banner cookie

case.text: Tracking cookies refused will not limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data
clauses.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.
clauses.clause_text: The following describes the ways we collect information from you

case.text: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

clauses.title: No need to register
clauses.description: This service can be used without providing a user profile.
clauses.clause_text: We do not require you to register or provide personal information to visit our website.

case.text: No need to register

clauses.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
clauses.description: The service may employ a broad copyright license over feedback, proposals, ideas and suggestions submitted, including the right to use them without restriction, compensation or obligation to the user, but they do not claim ownership on them.
clauses.clause_text: By communicating with the Postal Service, however, users grant the Postal Service permission to use any information, suggestions, ideas, drawings or concepts communicated for any purpose the Postal Service chooses, commercial, public or otherwise, without compensation whatsoever.

case.text: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: If you have provided personal information to us, you may request to review the information that we have maintained. Please contact the program office that provided you the product or service, the office that handled your inquiry, or the privacy office at the addresses below. We will correct or delete any inaccurate information upon your request.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
clauses.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text: We automatically collect certain information about your visit to usps.com. We limit the data collected to meet specific business needs and to fully protect your privacy. We thus may know what path(s) you took on usps.com, but we don't know who you are.

case.text: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

clauses.title: This service does not sell your personal data
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We do not sell or rent your personal information to outside parties.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
clauses.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.
clauses.clause_text: The USPS holds service providers to the same rigorous standards of privacy that apply to the USPS, including being made subject to the Privacy Act and USPS privacy policies.

case.text: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: You may terminate this agreement at any time by discontinuing your use of the Postal Service site and destroying all materials obtained from it.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: The user is informed about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text: In those instances where we secure your personal information in transit to us and upon receipt, the Postal Service uses the industry standard encryption software, Secured Socket Layer (SSL). The URL in your browser will change to "HTTPS" instead of "HTTP" when this security feature is invoked.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text:
You will only receive marketing about products and services of the Postal Service or its partners, other than products and services you already receive or are registered for, under the following conditions.

  • If you are a consumer, we use an opt-in standard.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: Under no circumstances, including but not limited to negligence, will the Postal Service be liable for special or consequential damages that result from the use or inability to use the materials in this site.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text:
Opting out of all cookies â€“ You may choose to opt out of the use of all cookies.
You will still be able to access most features of usps.com.
However, certain features may not work as well or may be unavailable to you.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
clauses.description: The service rejects any responsibility for the contents of other websites to which it links.
clauses.clause_text:
The Postal Service offers links to, and listings of, various third-party Web sites for the convenience of its customers, and, unless otherwise expressly indicated, no affiliation between the Postal Service and an entity linked to or listed is intended.
Except where indicated, the Postal Service does not endorse any company or product not offered by the Postal Service including the advertisers on linked Web sites or on the web sites of listed entities.

case.text: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

clauses.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
clauses.clause_text: The Postal Service is not responsible for material submitted to the Postal Service or posted in chatrooms or on bulletin boards by site users.

case.text: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents

clauses.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
clauses.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.
clauses.clause_text: "THE POSTAL SERVICE DOES NOT WARRANT OR REPRESENT THAT THE INFORMATION IS ACCURATE OR RELIABLE OR THAT THE SITE WILL BE FREE OF ERRORS OR VIRUSES."

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.
clauses.clause_text: Users may view and download material from this site only for the following purposes: (a) for personal, non-commercial home use.

case.text: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

clauses.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text: Users may not use language that is threatening, abusive, vulgar, discourteous or criminal.

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: THE MATERIALS IN THIS SITE ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: This service prohibits users from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
clauses.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.
clauses.clause_text: Users also may not post or transmit information or materials that would violate rights of any third party or which contains a virus or other harmful component.

case.text: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
We also use the information to tell us of any possible site performance problems and to identify, prevent, or mitigate the effects of fraudulent transactions.

  • Referral and statistical information where we have links or ad banners to or from usps.com. Such data may include aggregate data such as the number of click-throughs that occurred.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: THE POSTAL SERVICE DOES NOT WARRANT OR REPRESENT THAT THE INFORMATION IS ACCURATE OR RELIABLE

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements
clauses.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.
clauses.clause_text: TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMISSIBLE PURSUANT TO APPLICABLE LAW, THE POSTAL SERVICE DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES , EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

case.text: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements

clauses.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text:
We automatically collect and store the following information about your visit:

  • General log informationâ€”Internet domain (for example, "xcompany.com" or "yourschool.edu"). Internet Protocol (IP) address. operating system. the browser used to access our Web site. the date and time you access our site. and the pages that you visited.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
